channel.title: CVE Feed for Miele -- appWash
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Miele -- appWash

item.title: CVE-2022-3589|2024-08-03T01:14:01.961Z -- miele -- appwash
item.description: An API Endpoint used by Miele's "AppWash" MobileApp in all versions was vulnerable to an authorization bypass. A low privileged, remote attacker would have been able to gain read and partial write access to other users data by modifying a small part of a HTTP request sent to the API. Reading or changing the password of another user was not possible, thus no impact to Availability.
